author: KMB2913
title: Stay in a real part of Beijing !
text:
Turn off the main road into the narrow streets of the Hutong district and you might be a bit concerned about the area - don't be, as you soon arrive at an oasis which is the Shadow Art Hotel.
A friendly welcome from the staff and we quickly realise this boutique hotel provides first class accomodation. There are plenty of common areas to sit and relax and our room was spacious and well appointed. There is plenty of choice for breakfast in the morning, both Chinese and western.
The location in the Hutong district allows you to explore the area which has not been developed with modern buildings, it feels like a real part of the old city. Despite initial reservations the area is very safe day and night and 20 minutes walk from a good selection of restaurants.
The Hutong is a fascinating area and can be explored on foot from the hotel.
